title: MSN-04II Nightingale
series: Mobile Suit Gundam: Char's Counterattack - Beltorchika's Children
notes: First Reborn-One Hundred released, and the first release from the Universal Century timeline. First and currently the only RE/100 kit to use MP2 plate runner. Largest and most expensive RE/100 kit. Neck accommodates Gunpla LED Unit (sold separately).

title: MSF-007 Gundam Mk-III
Gundam GP04G Gerbera
MSK-008 Dijeh
notes: First release from the canonical UC timeline. Uses the H plate runner of MG-187 for weapons.

title: MS-08TX[EXAM] Efreet Custom
series: Mobile Suit Gundam Side Story: The Blue Destiny
notes: Includes a booklet containing Chapter 3 of the Blue Destiny Vol. 1 manga.

title: AMX-107 Bawoo
notes: First transformable/separable kit in the series. Also the first RE/100 kit to have bilingual Japanese/English text on its box packaging and instruction manual.

title: AMX-103 Hamma-Hamma
notes: Includes four clear display stands for Wire-Guided 3-Barrel Beam Guns/Claws.

title: MSA-005K Guncannon Detector
notes: Includes 170mm cannon for the P-Bandai exclusive MG MSA-003 Nemo (Unicorn Desert Color Ver.).

title: XM-07 Vigna-Ghina
notes: Released as part of Bandai's "UC NexT 0100" project. Includes two different cockpit hatches.

title: MSN-03 Gyunei Guss's Jagd Doga
notes: Released to commemorate the 30th anniversary of Char's Counterattack and as part of Bandai's "UC NexT 0100" project. Includes effect parts for funnels.

title: LM111E02 Gun EZ
notes: Uses G and H plate runners of MG-127 for frame and beam shield effect part. Released as part of Bandai's "UC NexT 0100" project and to commemorate the 25th anniversary of Victory Gundam.

title: XM-07B Vigna-Ghina II
notes: Parts and color variant of RE-009.

title: MS-06FZ Zaku II FZ
series: Mobile Suit Gundam 0080: War in the Pocket
notes: Uses no polycaps. Includes additional head parts to create Commander Type and Type-B variants. First 1/100 scale Gunpla kit ever to have hands where the back of the hand substitutes the palm, similar to a High Grade model, rather than having the usual complete hands. Released to commemorate the 30th anniversary of Gundam 0080.

title: Expansion Funnel Set for MG Sazabi Ver.Ka & RE/100 Nightingale
series: Mobile Suit Gundam: Char's Counterattack - Beltorchika's Children
notes: P-Bandai exclusive accessory kit for RE-001. Also compatible with MG-175.

title: Gundam GP04G Gerbera Clear Color Ver.
notes: Gunpla Expo World Tour Japan 2016 Summer [Ikebukuro] exclusive clear color variant of RE-003.

title: MS-08TX/S Efreet Schneid
notes: P-Bandai exclusive parts and color variant of RE-005.

title: AMX-107R Rebawoo
series: Mobile Suit Gundam UC: One of Seventy Two
notes: P-Bandai exclusive parts and color variant of RE-006. Uses the J, K, M, and O plate runners of MG-167. Includes additional water slide decal sheet.

title: MS-08TX[EXAM] Efreet Custom [Clear Color]
series: Mobile Suit Gundam Side Story: The Blue Destiny
notes: The Gundam Base Tokyo exclusive clear color variant of RE-005 to promote "Gundam Build Fighters World".

title: AMX-107 Bawoo Mass Production Type
notes: P-Bandai exclusive color variant of RE-006.

title: MSA-005K Guncannon Detector (Z-MSV Ver.)
notes: P-Bandai exclusive parts and color variant of RE-008.

title: MSF-007-8 Gundam Mk-III Unit 8
notes: P-Bandai exclusive color variant of RE-002. Includes water slide decal sheet.

title: Type89 Base Jabber
notes: P-Bandai exclusive release. Requires three Action Base 1 or Action Base 4 units for aerial poses.

title: XM-07S Vigna-Ghina (Berah Ronah Special)
notes: P-Bandai exclusive parts and color variant of RE-009.

title: MSN-03 Quess Air's Jagd Doga
notes: P-Bandai exclusive color variant of RE-010 with new head parts; Beam Assault Rifle replaced by Mega Gatling Gun. Includes additional "Sleeves" parts to create MSN-03 Jagd Doga (Unicorn Ver.), which also requires right arm and backpack parts from P-Bandai exclusive MG AMS-119 Geara Doga (Unicorn Ver.) (sold separately).

title: LM111E03 Gun Blaster
notes: P-Bandai exclusive color variant of RE-011 with new parts. First press release includes additional water slide decal sheet for mobile suits from Victory Gundam in MG and RE/100. Released to commemorate the 25th anniversary of Victory Gundam.

title: Type89 Base Jabber (Unicorn Ver.)
notes: P-Bandai exclusive color variant of RE/100 Type89 Base Jabber. Requires three Action Base 1 or Action Base 4 units for aerial poses.

title: LM111E02 Gun EZ Ground Type
notes: P-Bandai exclusive parts and color variant of RE-011. Includes water slide decal sheet.

title: XM-07G Vigna-Zirah
series: Mobile Suit Gundam Silhouette Formula 91 in UC 0123
notes: P-Bandai exclusive parts and color variant of RE-009. Includes water slide decal sheet.

title: LM111E02 Gun EZ Prototype (Rollout Color)
notes: P-Bandai exclusive parts and color variant of RE-011. Includes water slide decal sheet.

title: ZMT-S12G Shokew
notes: P-Bandai exclusive release. Includes swappable camera eyes.
